channel.title: Need some clarification

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

I spoon feed

if (playerCommand.startsWith("home") && (c.playerRights >= 2)) { if (c.inWild()) return; } c.getPA().movePlayer(3086, 3493, 0); c.sendMessage("Home sweet home."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

[quote=“whogoesthere, post:8, topic:417549”][quote author=Hot_Potato link=topic=520104.msg3776762#msg3776762 date=1318145323]

Fail assumption my friend. By shit here I mean put the methods to teleport out of the Wildy else denied teleport and sendmessage you aren’t an admin or whatever. Before your think I’m trolling, catch up on my latest trolling threads. None as you will tell. And don’t expect anyone to spoonfeed you a code you could just copy and paste from another void in the server files. Trololololol

Haha! You crack me up!
OT:You can’t just expect us to give you a code to C+P.
[/quote]hmm let me think… this is a private server help section… I’m asking for help on a code so i don’t mess up on my server… the people who are supposed to help are refusing… hence leaving me on my own with my little coding knowledge to fuck up my private server… what kind of god damn bull shit is that?[/quote]
We give you an Idea. We don’t spoonfeed you, you have to create it yourself from the examples of whatever given to you. And If you want to learn java, buy books.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Where it says

Change it so it checks the player’s rights at the same time, so the command is only stopped when both checks are what you want them to be. For example:

Would only stop players from teleporting out of the wilderness if their player rights were less than 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:9, topic:417549”]I will but ill atleast explain it…

“if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(”Name of the command”)){ teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord; sendMessage(”What you want it to say when you type ::nameofcommand. you can delete this line.”); }”

kk this is simple all it is doing is stating the command, i guess.

That is where it will teleport you to after you type the command

teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord;

and finnally this is just like a message to the player after they teleport

sendMessage(”What you want it to say when you type ::nameofcommand. you can delete this line.”); }

I guess if your gonna teleport home like the command you have shown before, than i recommend that you dont make it an anti-wildy teleport (if that made sense).[/quote]not that command but i do need an anti wildy teleport i just do…espically because if someone needs to show me a bug in like level 50 wildy then how the fuck am i gunna get out?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

I will but ill atleast explain it…

“if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(”Name of the command”)){ teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord; sendMessage(”What you want it to say when you type ::nameofcommand. you can delete this line.”); }”

kk this is simple all it is doing is stating the command, i guess.

That is where it will teleport you to after you type the command

teleportToX = XCoord; teleportToY = YCoord;

and finnally this is just like a message to the player after they teleport

sendMessage(”What you want it to say when you type ::nameofcommand. you can delete this line.”); }

I guess if your gonna teleport home like the command you have shown before, than i recommend that you dont make it an anti-wildy teleport (if that made sense).

Read full topic

item.title: Need some clarification
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

ok i finally found a way to add at least some sort of teleport using code i found in commands.java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("home") && c.playerRights >= 0) { if (c.inWild()) return; c.getPA().movePlayer(3086, 3493, 0); c.sendMessage("Home sweet home."); }
but how would i alter this code to let someone with at least 2 player rights to teleport to a spot from anywhere even if they are in the wildy past level 20… because i need to do this if im going to help people that are past level 21 wildy and if i need a way out

Read full topic
